      ___ __ __
    .'  _|__|  |--.----.          fibr [faɪbə]
    |   _|  |  _  |   _|
    |__| |__|_____|__|       dual-pane file browser


  Similar to Midnight Commander, but with (way) less
  features and a few "opinionated" adjustments.
  It scratches an itch for me.

  More info: https://github.com/dehesselle/fibr
